Get all Tabler products in one bundle and save big!

![Tabler Icons Bundle](/_next/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fad-banners%2Fbundle.png&w=596&q=85&dpl=dpl_BAJ7Jo1Q6fNVqoXfMhvwQtuqjeqm)![Tabler Icons Bundle](/_next/image?url=%2Fimg%2Fad-banners%2Fbundle-dark.png&w=596&q=85&dpl=dpl_BAJ7Jo1Q6fNVqoXfMhvwQtuqjeqm)](https://r.tabler.io/buy-all?ref=customize-banner)

### All icons

### Can't find what you're looking for?

We're happy to add new icons, as soon as possible. Feel free to request new icons on Twitter.

[Message us on X](https://x.com/tabler_io)

[Get 250,000 more icons

By  **streamline**

Browse icons](https://go.streamlinehq.com/tablericons)

## Ready-to-use

You can use the icons as HTML images, embed them in your HTML code, create an SVG sprite or render them in React.

## Multiple formats

Icons can be used in Sketch, Illustrator, XD and Figma - choose the tool you feel the most comfortable working with.

## Customizable

Every icon is designed on a 24x24 grid and a 2px stroke. You can easily customize them, changing the size, stroke or color.

## Free and open source

Tabler Icons is a free and open source solution, which is continuously developed. Feel free to request an icon you need!

![Tabler Icons Figma plugin](/_next/image?url=%2Fimg%2Ftabler-icons%2Ffeatures%2Ffigma.png&w=1112&q=85&dpl=dpl_BAJ7Jo1Q6fNVqoXfMhvwQtuqjeqm)![Tabler Icons Figma plugin dark](/_next/image?url=%2Fimg%2Ftabler-icons%2Ffeatures%2Ffigma-dark.png&w=1112&q=85&dpl=dpl_BAJ7Jo1Q6fNVqoXfMhvwQtuqjeqm)

## Do you need Figma plugin? No problem!

Tabler Icons offers a plugin for Figma, with which you can easily find and customize the icons you just need. You will always find the newest icons that you can quickly add to your project!

[Get Figma plugin](https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1169807996149376642/Tabler-Icons)

## Enjoy Free Icons with Optional Support Plans

Tabler Icons is an open-source project. You can get it for free or support our work with an optional payment. Choose the all products package to enhance your designs with premium HTML template and illustrations.

### Open Source

Free

Get the free source code of the icons

- Source code only
- 4950+ SVG icons
- MIT License
- Personal & Commercial License
- Free updates
- Community support

[Browse on Github](https://github.com/tabler/tabler-icons)

### Bundle

$9

4950+ clean, consistent icons in multiple formats

- Compiled, ready to use
- PNG, PDF & EPS (stroke 2)
- Webfont version
- No code skills required
- Just download and use
- Personal & Commercial License
- One-time payment

[Download Icons](https://r.tabler.io/buy-icons?ref=pricing-cards)

Bestseller

### All Package

$69

Get your designs to the next level.

- Premium package of icons
- Stunning HTML admin template
- 105 premium SVG illustrations
- 80 email templates
- Personal & Commercial License
- Use on unlimited projects
- One-time payment

[Download Package](https://r.tabler.io/buy-all?ref=pricing-cards)

## Support our work

We are committed to creating high-quality, open-source icons and admin template that are accessible to everyone. If you find our work valuable and would like to support us, there are several ways you can do that.

![Support Illustration](/_next/image?url=%2Fillustrations%2Flight%2Fproject.png&w=1112&q=85&dpl=dpl_BAJ7Jo1Q6fNVqoXfMhvwQtuqjeqm)![Support Illustration](/_next/image?url=%2Fillustrations%2Fdark%2Fproject.png&w=1112&q=85&dpl=dpl_BAJ7Jo1Q6fNVqoXfMhvwQtuqjeqm)

### Sponsor us

Patronize us on [GitHub Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/codecalm), [Open Collective](https://opencollective.com/tabler) or [PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/codecalm) to back our project's growth. Together, we make a difference!

### Spread the word

Unlock the power of community! Share our project with your network and watch as we grow stronger together. The more people know, the more inspiration we gain to innovate and elevate our project! [Share on](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://tabler.io/icons&via=tabler_io&text=Check+out+Tabler+Icons+-+a+huge+set+of+free,+high-quality+vector+icons+for+web+design)

### Contribute

Calling all web wizards and SVG virtuosos! Dive into the world of [Tabler Icons](https://github.com/tabler/tabler-icons) and [Tabler Admin Template](https://github.com/tabler/tabler). Your contributions, big or small, will make waves in the web development community. Join the revolution today!
